check_name_length.description: Check that name column values are not too long (max 100 characters)
check_name_length.sql:
SELECT id, name
FROM @table_name
WHERE LENGTH(name) > 100

check_no_null_ids.sql:
SELECT id
    FROM @table_name
    WHERE id IS NULL

check_my_first_table_not_empty.sql:
SELECT 1 as violation
        FROM my_schema.my_first_table
        GROUP BY 1
        HAVING COUNT(*) = 0

check_my_first_table_id_positive.sql:
SELECT id
        FROM my_schema.my_first_table
        WHERE id <= 0

check_my_second_table_not_empty.sql:
SELECT 1 as violation
        FROM my_schema.my_second_table
        GROUP BY 1
        HAVING COUNT(*) = 0

check_my_second_table_id_positive.sql:
SELECT id
        FROM my_schema.my_second_table
        WHERE id <= 0
